video_prompt: Young anime woman shifts on bench, hair flowing, gently smiling as sunlight dances. Cherry blossoms flutter earthward, scattering anew. Clouds drift across a vibrant sky, distant hills shimmer.
image_prompt: Anime girl with long pink hair and purple eyes, sitting on a wooden bench, smiling. She wears a white school uniform with a red bow tie and dark pleated skirt, crest on blazer, teal earrings. Sunny outdoor scene with blue sky, fluffy clouds, distant green hills, scattered houses, Italian cypress trees, yellow flowers. Stone wall on the right with cherry blossoms/petals. Peaceful, beautiful.
refined_video_prompt: An anime woman subtly shifts, her hair flowing, a gentle smile unfolding as sunlight actively dances. Cherry blossoms flutter earthward, continuously scattering. Clouds drift across the sky, and distant hills softly shimmer.
